title: Title

slug.semanticStandard: Semantic standard for information with dossiers
slug.feedback: In case of questions or feedback, you can contact us via email or create a topic in our public GitHub issue-tracker.

overview.categoryStandard:
Technical standards: the technical specifications for data exchange, they provide ways of standardized data exchange.

Interoperability standards: a stable specification for the standard was developed, through a public review period implementation experience is gained and feedback from outside the thematic workgroup is collected.

Vocabulary: the basis for open semantic information standards, they provide a shared conceptual framework for certain concepts with a focus on data exchange.

Application profiles: a specification for data exchange for applications that fulfill a certain use case. It allows for additional restrictions to be imposed, such as setting cardinalities or using certain code lists, in addition to shared semantics.

Implementation model: a specification for data exchange for applications that fulfill a certain use case, these models can contain part of the internal data processing of specific applications. It allows for additional restrictions to be imposed, such as setting cardinalities or using certain code lists, in addition to shared semantics. The development of these models follows the same ideology as application profiles and vocabularies, but has not yet received official recognition within the OSLO process & method.
overview.statusStandard:
Recognized standards: were approved as standards within the Flemish government by the Data Standards Working Group of the Steering Committee Flemish Information and ICT policy after completing a recognition procedure.

Candidate standards: a stable specification for the standard was developed, through a public review period implementation experience is gained and feedback from outside the thematic workgroup is collected.

Standards in development: have already been registered with the Data Standards Working Group and are being developed by a thematic workgroup through public work sessions.

statistics.introduction: On this page, you will find various statistics of the OSLO standards. These statistics are merely an indication based on the data we have available.
